description.value:
Requirements You have a creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Grabbed]{Grabbed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Restrained]{Restrained}.

Flexing your entire body, you heave your opponent over your head and slam them into the ground. Make an unarmed melee Strike against the creature you have grabbed or restrained; on a success, the target lands @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Prone]{Prone}, and on a critical success, the target lands prone and takes an additional [[/r 2d6[bludgeoning]]] damage. Regardless of whether the Strike is successful, you immediately release your hold on the target.

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Grand Bazaar
